summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Fourteen Thousand Five Hundred ($14,500.00) Dollars, out of the General Fund in favor of Meadow Place Condemnation Fund, authorized by Ordinance No. 15924, and approved May 6, 1907, providing for the laying off, widening, extending and establishing of Meadow Place, University Boulevard, and East 70th Street, as further confirmed by the Honorable Superior Court of King County, Washington, as evidence in Cause No. 56660, said sum being that amount ordered by court to be paid by said General Fund for the amount of public benefits accruing from said improvement.
